biotools.summary: Easy RNA Profile IdentificatioN takes as input an RNA sequence alignment and secondary structure annotation and will identify a wide variety of known RNA motifs (such as tRNAs, 5S rRNAs, SRP RNA, C/D box snoRNAs, hammerhead motifs, miRNAs and others) in your sequence(s) of interest. Also contains tool for drawing secondary structure of motifs.

bioschemas.name: Erpin
bioschemas.summary: Easy RNA Profile IdentificatioN takes as input an RNA sequence alignment and secondary structure annotation and will identify a wide variety of known RNA motifs (such as tRNAs, 5S rRNAs, SRP RNA, C/D box snoRNAs, hammerhead motifs, miRNAs and others) in your sequence(s) of interest. Also contains tool for drawing secondary structure of motifs.
